backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, extensive ordered maps for ponds, posts, users, tags, likes, activity tracking, and related types. Contains all backend state structures for the platform.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report containing an empty features array.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing component behavior and layout details.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documentation outlining prerequisites and steps for deploying the Ribbit application to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint that loads the frontend app and sets metadata, favicon, and root div.
frontend/scripts/combined-update.sh: Bash script automating backend binding generation, frontend build, and canister deployment with error handling and colored output.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global layout, theming, and ensures Froggy Phrase generation on app mount.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component that interacts with useBookmarks to mark or unmark a lily.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Renders a comment with avatar, metadata, content, and optional like/reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: UI component for reacting to content with emoji types, showing counts and selection state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links, copyright text, and attribution link using lucide-react icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Navigation header with logo, search bar, and user avatar, handling mobile and desktop search behaviors with dropdowns and modals.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout wiring header, footer, routed content, and a mobile left-sidebar drawer that closes on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar showing navigation links and recent activity items with active route highlighting and pond/lily data fetching.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Card component rendering a lily post with metadata, avatar, stats, like/share actions, and optional tags.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Image frame that computes aspect ratio and displays images with a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 formats.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the left sidebar with overlay, slide animation, and body scroll lock.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Sidebar showing pond details, stats, moderator info, and join/leave actions with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Join button control for pond cards, handling join mutation, disabled states, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile pond header showing banner, profile info, and tabs with navigation.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with voting, metadata, preview content, image, tag, and comment/view counts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user's ribbit on their profile with avatar, linked post title, timestamp, and navigation to the conversation.
Popover emoji picker allowing quick emoji selection for ribbits.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Shows a ribbit with nesting, like functionality, reply form, and user avatar loading.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Progressively loads an avatar image with a blurred placeholder and transition effects.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Right sidebar listing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Mobile full-screen search modal showing trending searches and suggestions with input handling.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Dropdown for desktop search showing trending terms or suggestions based on query input.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar for the tag hub showing top, trending, and newest tags with activity stats.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides wrapper components for tab lists and triggers with underline-specific styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper functions to modify them.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced value that updates after a delay when the input changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for Internet Identity login, state management, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a given media query matches, updating on window resize events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for ponds, posts, profiles, and other backend interactions using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, and utility classes for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into compact strings like 1.2k or 1.5M.
frontend/src/lib/froggyPhraseWordList.ts: Exports frog-themed and general English word lists used for generating Froggy Phrases.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Validates, resizes, and compresses images client-side, with GIF animation detection.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Provides alphanumeric validation, normalization, and error messages for pond names.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by lilyCount, memberCount, and name, returning a rank map.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link via Web Share API or copies it to clipboard as fallback.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns user-friendly errors.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, user IDs, settings backup, and generates/stores a 12‑word Froggy Phrase.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per‑lily cooldown tracking for view increments using localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with platform description, features, and community guidelines using static content and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a list of all ponds with loading states, ranking, join controls, and navigation to create or view ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form for creating lilies with support for text, image, or link types, tag suggestions, validation, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Implements pond creation with name validation, image uploads with compression, and optional froggy phrase handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Offers a post creation interface supporting text, image, and link posts with pond selection, image compression, and submission logic.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile with avatar, stats, and tabs for posts and comments, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main feed of lilies with search, sorting, sidebars, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Renders a single lily post with comments, likes, views, image handling, and view-count increment logic.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays detailed pond information including moderators, metadata, and join/leave controls with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Shows a pond’s lily feed with sorting, sidebars, banner, and handling for loading and missing ponds.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Displays a detailed post view with comments, loading states, and the ability to create new ribbit comments. Fetches post data, threaded comments, and handles sorting and form submission.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows a list of locally bookmarked lilies, rendering each with loading/error fallbacks and allowing removal from bookmarks. Uses LilyCard for valid items and displays empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Renders a hub of top, trending, and newest tags with ranking, stats, and navigation links. Fetches multiple tag lists and displays loading skeletons or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies associated with a specific tag with sorting options and subcategories. Includes sidebars, loading states, and dynamic list rendering.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user settings for username changes, avatar uploads, profile data, pond memberships, and admin tools. Handles validation, availability checks, uploads, and various user-related mutations.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations for the project.
project_state.json: Defines project state, architectural notes about removing principal-based checks in pond creation, known auto-join bugs, and pending feature requests to fix pond creator auto-joining using phrase-hash userId.
